content: **crochet dress and summer hat in drops alpaca knitted and felted bag in drops alaska sizes for baby and children 1 month to 4 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ dress size 1/3 6/9 12/18 months 2 3/4 years size in cm 50/56 62/68 74/80 86/92 98/104 hat size 1/3 -6/18 month 2/4 years to fit head circumference approx 40/42 44/46 48/50 cm the dress & hat are crocheted the bag is knitted gauge shown is for crochet for dress & hat for bag knitting gauge 16 sts x 20 row on needles size 5 5 mm with alaska in stocking sts = 10 x 10 cm yardage given is for entire set dress 150-200-200 250-250 g colour 3720 old rose + a remainder of 7300 lime and 3140 light rose for the flower hat 50-50 100 g colour no 3720 old rose + a remainder of 7300 lime and 3140 light rose for the flower bag 50 g colour no 02 off white alaska + a remainder of colour no 21 off white vienna and colour no 36 rose vienna + a remainder of colour no 3140 light rose alpaca **pattern links ** german version 1 swedish version 2 french version 3 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=4 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=4&lang=se 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=4
